sentences.sContent: Only you could get into trouble in a town this small.
sentences.sContent_eng: Only you could get into trouble in a town this small.
sentences.sCn: 只有你才能在这么小的城镇里遇上麻烦。

sentences.sContent: If you get into trouble, I’ll step out and help you out.
sentences.sContent_eng: If you get into trouble, I’ll step out and help you out.
sentences.sCn: 如果你遇到麻烦，我一定站出来帮助你走出困境。

sentences.sContent: If someone swore, I would copy them and get into trouble for shouting the word out.
sentences.sContent_eng: If someone swore, I would copy them and get into trouble for shouting the word out.
sentences.sCn: 如果有人发誓，我就会跟着做，然后等待着接受因喊出这些话而得到的麻烦。
